description:
Vander took one look at Foster and said, "I love his Rugby body-type!"
I couldn't quite peg his build, but I think Vander nailed it perfectly.
He is not a tall guy, but no too short. Just has that thick build (everwhere...his cock gives Vander's a run for width and length), so Rugby-esque suits him well.
He is a natural show-off. Foster has beautiful green eyes, and big luscious lips (that might look good wrapped around a cock!)
His solo is very hot, and even if you have a specific body type you prefer, you can see Foster is a little sex machine.
And speaking of Vander, he will be in next week to tie the dude to a silver chair.
But enjoy getting to know this hot 'footballer' today!
He shoots his load so far, it not only hits him smack in the forehead, but the headboard behind him!
title: Foster - Solo
